episode.title: 好きな子とバレンタインデーに会った
I Met with the Girl I Like on Valentine`s Day
Suki na Ko to Valentine Day ni Atta
episode.summary: The eternal hope and fear of every boy in love: will or won`t Komura receive chocolates from Mie on Valentine`s Day? And if he does, are they special chocolates, or just friend chocolates? Source: crunchyroll
